physical_appearance:\The image shows a piece of tongs. It is black in colour and it has two long and thin arms. For the right arm of the tongs
 its side panel is textured. This is absent for the left arm of the tongs. The tongs are black in colour. At the base of the tongs
 the words
 \\Made in England\\ are displayed in bold letters.\

sgcool_label_text:Tongs such as this are used to handle photographic films during film processing. The textured side panels provide a firmer grip. This tong is part of the darkroom photography equipment that was previously used by The Picture Farm
 which was set up by the renowned photographer Willie Tang.

metadata.physical_appearance: "The image shows a piece of tongs. It is black in colour and it has two long and thin arms. For the right arm of the tongs, its side panel is textured. This is absent for the left arm of the tongs. The tongs are black in colour. At the base of the tongs, the words, ""Made in England"" are displayed in bold letters."

metadata.sgcool_label_text: Tongs such as this are used to handle photographic films during film processing. The textured side panels provide a firmer grip. This tong is part of the darkroom photography equipment that was previously used by The Picture Farm, which was set up by the renowned photographer Willie Tang.
